themes.name: True Light Anime v1.0
themes.description:
True Light Anime 1.0
True Light Anime is a theme that based on True Light Theme,
An anime theme For your Discord.

Change Log:
· Added Background to the theme.
· changed Dm's list name color
· Removed Rainbow colors Anywhere.
· Built-in Control System
· Added NewsBar (Controlled by The Web)

themes.name: True Light v1.0 Beta
themes.description:
True Light 1.0 (Beta)
True Light is a new edition Based on MineCore.

Change Log:
· New Background.
· Added Rainbow colors to local Name.
· Added control system
· Added Rainbow Colors to the Active Now Page
· Added NewsBar (Controlled by The Web)
· Fixed Share Screen Black Background
